text: Carlo Smuraglia (12 August 1923 â€“ 30 May 2022) was an Italian politician, academic, lawyer and partisan. He was the President of National Association of Italian Partisans from 2011 to 2017. Before, he was a Member of the Senate from 1992 until 2001. Smuraglia was born in Ancona, Italy. Smuraglia died on 30 May 2022 in Milan, Italy at the age of 98. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Marche Category:Italian academics Category:Italian lawyers Category:People from Ancona
title: Carlo Smuraglia
